result.execSummary:
The defendant Jerry L Ferguson Jr was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possess w/Intent-Cocaine (<=5G) [Modifiers: Use of a Dangerous Weapon], a class F felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(1m)(cm)1r.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: DNA surcharge and pay court costs and victim/witness surcharges are to be collected by DOC from up to 25% of prison funds, balance to be paid by 9-10-17; nonpayment penlaty shall be a civil judgment. Restitution set at zero.
Consecutive to: to any other sentence

superMiscConds.notes: Court advised the defendant that as a convicted felon he may no longer use or possess any firearms or body armor.

Absolute sobriety with random urine screens and breathalyzers.
Successfully complete a Cognitive Thinking Behavioral Modification Program.
May not vote in any election until his civil rights have been restored.
AODA assessment and any recommended treatment.

records.addlTxt:
Exhibits received and inventoried this date.  
Box D251
cf
Associated with Charge #1

Defendant Jerry L Ferguson in court with attorney James Edgar Toran.  Defendant Jerry L Ferguson in custody.  Laura A. Crivello appeared for the State of Wisconsin./ SAB
  Sentencing Proceeded. Statements by the State, defense counsel and defendant. Additional statements by: Lenoria F.
The Court sentenced defendant to serve a term of IMPRISONMENT in the Wisconsin State Prisons for 36 MONTHS.  INITIAL CONFINEMENT of 18 MONTHS and EXTENDED SUPERVISION of 18 MONTHS, consecutive to any other sentence, credit for 17 days.
Defendant is not eligible for the Challenge Incarceration Program and is not eligible for the Wisconsin Substance Abuse Program.
-Restitution set at zero
-Court costs and victim/witness surcharges are to be collected by DOC from up to 25% of prison funds, balance to be paid by 9/10/2017; nonpayment penalty shall be a civil judgment.
-Defendant is to provide a DNA sample and pay the related surcharge  to be collected by DOC from up to 25% of prison funds, balance to be paid by 9/10/2017; nonpayment penalty shall be a civil judgment.
-6 month drivers license suspension
CONDITIONS OF EXTENDED SUPERVISION:
-AODA assessment and any recommended treatment
-Absolute sobriety with random urine screens and breathalyzers
-No alcohol or controlled substances
-Employment or school
-Successfully complete a Cognitive Thinking Behavioral Modification Program
Court advised the defendant that as a convicted felon he may no longer use or possess any firearms or body armor; also he may not vote in any election until his civil rights have been restored.
Filed, Written Explanation of Determinate Sentence
Filed, Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief
Filed, Ineligible Voting Notice and Acknowledgement

Defendant Jerry L Ferguson not in court, defendant in custody.  Laura A. Crivello appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defense counsel, James Toran, appeared by phone.
This ccourt is in jury trial posture.  Court ordered case adjourned for sentencing in Branch 15.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for 09-10-2014 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Jerry L Ferguson in court with attorney James Edgar Toran.  Laura A. Crivello appeared for the State of Wisconsin./ SAB
Jury in the box: 8:35 am. Court sent the panel to continue deliberations. Jury out of the box: 8:38 am. Jury in the box: 10:00 am. Court addressed jury question. Jury out of the box: 10:02 am.  At the hour of 12:03 pm the jury returned and, by their foreperson, brought in a verdict of GUILTY which was then read.  Court polled and discharged the jury.  Verdict received and filed.  Court granted state's motion for judgment on the verdict and denied defense motion for judgment not withstanding the verdict.  Court ordered entry of judgment of conviction. Court advised the defendant that as a convicted fleon he may no longer use or possess any firearms; also he may not vote in any election until his civil rights have been restored. Case calendared for SENTENCING on 9/3/2014 at 10:00 am in Branch 15. 
  Court ordered defendant REMANDED into the custody of the Milwaukee County Sheriff's Department.

Defendant Jerry L Ferguson in court with attorney James Edgar Toran.  Laura A. Crivello appeared for the State of Wisconsin./ SAB
Jury in the box: 1:17 pm. Sworn for the defense: Lenoria F. Jury out of the box: 2:04 pm. Jury in the box: 2:37 pm. Defense rests. Sworn as rebuttal for the State: Officer Patrick Fuhrman. State rests. Testimony closed. Jury out of the box: 2:54 pm. Jury in the box: 3:07 pm.  Court instructed jury.  Closing arguments by state and defense.  Court charged the jury.   Jury retired at the hour of 4:41 pm to deliberate in the charge of Sheriff's Deputies R. Hoffman and C. Blankenburg who were duly sworn for that purpose. Jury in the box: 4:55 pm. Jury out of the box: 5:00 pm. Trial recessed for the day.

Defendant Jerry L Ferguson in court with attorney James Edgar Toran.  Laura A. Crivello appeared for the State of Wisconsin./ SAB
Jury in the box: 9:32 am. Sworn for the State: Officer Bodo Gajevic. Jury out of the box: 11:24 am. Defense motion for directed verdict at close of state's case denied by the court.  Jury in the box: 11:48 am.  State rests subject to rebuttal. Exhibits #1 - #13, #15 - #26, #29 - #32, #34 and #35 received. Sworn for the defense: Jereta F. Jury out of the box: 12:14 pm. Trial recessed for lunch.

Defendant Jerry L Ferguson in court with attorney James Edgar Toran.  Laura A. Crivello appeared for the State of Wisconsin./ SAB
Jury in the box: 1:22 pm. Testimony of officer Fuhrman continued. Jury out of the box: 2:27 pm. Jury in the box: 2:42 pm. Sworn for the State: Dante H. Jury out of the box: 3:45 pm. Sworn for the State: Patricia Dobrowski, Forensic Investigator; Sylvia Gerasch, Forensic Investigator; Andrew Smith. Forensic Investigator; Chet St Clair, Forensic Investigator; Matthew Maudlin, Forensic Investgator. Jury out of the box: 4:46 pm. Trial recessed for the day.
Court withdraws the material witness warrant for Dante Hunter. sab

Defendant Jerry L Ferguson in court with attorney James Edgar Toran.  Laura A. Crivello appeared for the State of Wisconsin./ SAB
Jury in the box: 9:10 am. Jury out of the box: 9:24 am. Jury in the box: 9:26 am. Twelve (12) good and lawful citizens of the County of Milwaukee, WI qualified to serve as jurors in the above entitled cause were duly impanelled and sworn.  Jury list received and filed.  Court ordered witnesses sequestered.  Court instructed jury.  Opening statements by state and defense.  Trial proceeded.  Sworn for the state: Officer Patrick Fuhrman. Jury out of the box: 9:58 am. Jury in the box: 10:21 am. Testimony of officer Fuhrman commenced. Jury out of the box: 11:08 am. Jury in the box: 11:25 am. Jury out of the box: 11:53 am. Trial recessed for lunch.

Defendant Jerry L Ferguson in court with attorney James Edgar Toran.  Laura A. Crivello appeared for the State of Wisconsin./ SAB
  Jury panel in court.  Voir dire proceeded at the hour of  2:33 pm.  Jury out of the box: 3:45 pm. Jury in the box: 4:04 pm. Jury out of the box: 4:40 pm. Jury in the box: 4:54 pm. Jury out of the box: 4:59 pm. Trial recessed for the day.

Defendant Jerry L Ferguson in court with attorney James Edgar Toran.  Laura A. Crivello appeared for the State of Wisconsin./ SAB
Final pretrial held. Case remains on the calendar for Jury Trial on 8/25/2014 at 9:00 am.
FOR DEFAULTING WITNESS DANTE C HUNTER

Defendant Jerry L Ferguson in court with attorney James E Toran.  Laura A Crivello appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Court having been advised that witness, Dante Hunter had been subpoenaed and served.  Court ordered that a bench warrant be issued for the defaulting witness.  Case adjourned for final pretrial on 8-22-2014 and for jury trial on 8-25-2014.  Parties have been notified that effective August 3, 2014, this case is reassigned to Judge J.D. Watts, Branch 15, Room G-55 of the Criminal Justice Facility.

Defendant Jerry L Ferguson in court with attorney James E Toran.  Laura A Crivello appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
State's material witness is not present.  State asks for a material witness warrant.  Motion granted.  Case adjourned for final pretrial on 8-22-2014 and for jury trial on 8-25-2014.  Parties have been notified that effective August 3, 2014, this case is reassigned to Judge J.D. Watts, Branch 15, Room G-55 of the Criminal Justice Facility.  Final pre-trial scheduled for 08-22-2014 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Jerry L Ferguson in court with attorney James E Toran.  Laura A Crivello appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Clerk;ds

Final pretrial held in chambers.  State has a trial set in another court on this date.  Parties stipulate that the substance was cocaine.  Case remains set for jury trial.
State's Amended Witness List received and filed./ds

Attorney Toran is ill today and is asking for an adjournment.  Final pre-trial scheduled for June 27, 2014 at 09:00 am.  Jury trial scheduled for June 30, 2014 at 09:00 am.

State's Motion in Limine, Jury Instruction List and State's Witness List received and filed.   Final pretrial held in chambers.  Court finds the State's Motions in Limine are not timely filed and will not be considered.  Case remains set for jury trial.

Defendant Jerry L Ferguson in court with attorney James E Toran.  Laura Crivello appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Clerk;ds

Pretrial scheduling order received and filed.  Attorney Toran has another jury trial set in Br. 03 on that day.  Final pre-trial scheduled for June 6, 2014 at 09:30 am.  Jury trial scheduled for June 9, 2014 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Jerry L Ferguson in court with attorney James Edgar Toran.  Laura A. Crivello appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Clerk;ds
  Pre-trial conference scheduled for April 23, 2014 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Jerry L Ferguson in court with attorney James Edgar Toran.  Randy Sitzberger for Laura A. Crivello appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Defendant waived Preliminary Hearing.  Preliminary Hearing Questionnaire and Waiver received and filed. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Konkol, Branch 44. Original Information filed.  Copy given to defense counsel who waived reading.  Defendant pled not guilty.  Scheduling conference scheduled for April 2, 2014 at 08:30 am.
Court ordered no possession or use of NO ILLEGAL DRUGS or no dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Jerry L Ferguson in court with attorney James Edgar Toran.  Carole R. Manchester appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC.
Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Konkol, Branch 44.
Defendant given a copy of complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed complaint and found probable cause to hold defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT DOES NOT QUALIFY FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  Case is adjourned for preliminary hearing in Branch PE. Assistant District Attorney Carole R. Manchester approves setting before 6 business day rule.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for March 17, 2014 at 08:30 am.
